name: Shaanxi Heyang Jinqiao Coal Mine
company_mentions: Heyang County Jinqiao Coal Co Ltd

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Heyang County Jinqiao Coal Co Ltd, which is a subsidiary of Shaanxi Coal Industry.
